pullRequest.title: Remove any reference to decrypt and improve error message
pullRequest.bodyText:
I carefully read the contribution guidelines and agree to them.

This definitely removes any reference to "decrypt": it was still used to build the custom JS to send to the interpreter, therefore it can be changed if changed everywhere. On my machine tests pass.

nodes.bodyText: This doesn't seem okay to me. That name is string matched against the page contents. You shouldn't change it.
Same as above. Pretty sure you may not change this. However, you should consider extracting it into a global constant, too.

commit.message: Remove any reference to decrypt and improve error message

afterCommit.message: Remove any reference to decrypt and improve error message
